modName: Skyrim Main Theme Replacement - Metal Version
summary: Replaces the main menu music with a metal cover of the Sons of Skyrim track, complete with drums and guitar!
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the main menu music with a metal cover of the Sons of Skyrim track, complete with drums and guitar!

To install simply extract the contents of the archive into \'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\'

Original cover by Eric Calderone - 331Erock

You can see the original [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yDE2VQzghp4]here.[/url]

You can also find his first album [url=http://itunes.apple.com/us/album/hollywood-shred-ep/id416710905?ign-mpt=uo%3D4]here.[/url]

And his facebook page [url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Eric-Calderone/149426498434986?sk=wall]here.[/url]
author: Lozzer

files.name: Skyrim Main Theme Replacement - Metal Version
